messages.subject: The school wants more
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/25/02 6:11:08 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/25/02 6:11:08 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< , but after reading what you all have to say on the matter, I think I will
ignore her request for more information and keep the second letter for
myself
as something to read when I need to vent to myself >>


I have to say, I'm kinda glad you decided that.
My thinking was more along the lines that you'd be giving them power by
aqiescing to their request. There are times we need to stand up for what we
believe, loudly and strongly...this was not one of them imo.
They had no right to ask for anything further and by giving them anything
more it just makes them in control still. yk?
I think your letter was great though!!!

Ren
